pages.title: Swamp Moccasin
pages.text: Agkistrodon piscivorus is a species of pit viper in the subfamily Crotalinae of the family Viperidae.$(br2)It is one of the world's few semiaquatic vipers ($(o)along with the Florida cottonmouth$()), and is native to the southeastern United States.

pages.title: Swamp Moccasin
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
